(Simplified: 辍)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 叕 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 叕 [ zhuó ] to connect
①中止，停止：輟止。輟學。輟筆。輟演。中輟。日夜不輟。
輟學 [ chuò xué ]: to drop out of school; to leave off studying; to interrupt one's studies
輟筆 [ chuò bǐ ]: to stop writing or painting; to leave off writing midway
輟學率 [ chuò xué lǜ ]: drop-out rate (from schooling)
(Simplified: 辍)

Usage example 用法举例: 輟学 chuò xué (forced to quit school)

輟字的基本解释

輟
chuò
见“辍”。

輟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuò］
［《廣韻》陟劣切，入薛，知。］
［《廣韻》陟衛切，去祭，知。］
“辍1”的繁体字。
(1)中途停止；中断。
(2)废止。
(3)舍弃；离开。
(4)撤销；撤除。
(5)让，让出。
(6)通“掇”。取。
(7)通“綴”。参见“輟卷”。
(8)通“惙”。参见“輟輟”。

輟字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輟； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1244第32
〔古文〕?【廣韻】陟劣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】株劣切，?音啜。【說文】車小缺復合者。　又【廣韻】已也。【集韻】止也。【增韻】歇也。

The traditional characters of "Student 1".

(2) Repeal.
(3) Abandon; leave.
(4) Revocation; removal.
(5) Let, let go.
(6) Through "掇". take.
(7) Through "fix". See "dropout volume".
(8) Through "Xiang". See "dropout".
